description.fr: Vaincre tous les Taures adverses. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} aux Taures. \--- Lorsqu'un Taure subit des dégâts\_: {PMvalue:pm,+} jusqu'à la fin de son prochain tour.
description.en: Defeat all the opposing Taurs. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} to the Taurs. \--- When a Taur takes damage: {PMvalue:pm,+} until the end of his next turn.
description.es: Vencer a todos los toros contrarios. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} a los toros. \--- Cuando un toro sufre daños: {PMvalue:pm,+} hasta el final de su próximo turno.
description.de: Alle gegnerischen Tauren besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} für die Tauren. \--- Wenn ein Taurus Schaden erleidet: {PMvalue:pm,+} bis zum Ende seiner nächsten Runde.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tauros adversários. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:po,percent,+} aos Tauros. \--- Quando um Tauro sofrr dano: {PMvalue:pm,+} até o fim do seu próximo turno.
